document.full_text: daniel f. akerson, the chief executive of general motors, said that he hopes the government will be able to sell its stake in the automaker soon and expressed concern about the country's economic recovery.
document.title: g.m. still hopeful of fully paying back the government
lines_and_colors: daniel f. akerson, the chief executive of general motors, said that he hopes the government will be able to sell its stake in the automaker soon and expressed concern about the country's economic recovery.
